title: People Crossing!
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Chika-san…. Thank you for the recipe. I didn’t have it…. So I’m happy<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Same goes to you, thank you! I’m glad that I was able to sell bubbles at your place~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I also want…. Everyone else to come here. Right now…. The price of bubbles…. Is very high. Rina-chan’s board 「Ehem」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Then, I’ll go tell You-chan and everyone else! By the way, Rina-chan, I don’t think that that recipe is very popular, are you sure you’re okay with that? I have others too, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>No…. It’s alright. Right now…. Everyone from Nijigaku is making something….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeh, what is it? Tell me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>A concert hall. Everyone is…. making it together<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeeeh!? You guys too!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>“Too”? Chika-san, are you guys also making…. A concert hall….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yeah! Ahaha, everyone is thinking of the same thing huh~. Hey hey, when the Nijigaku concert hall is finished, let me come and play! Of course, I want you to visit ours too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
